Articles.Content:
"We will not be an advanced society as long as a gust of wind can prevent a rocket launch" -That guy who played Mr. Conductor and swore a lot. (George Carlin)

If we get clouds, maybe weather is in order as well. Maybe not even on Kerbin at all, but instead only on Eve, Jool, and Layhte? Would add an interesting mechanic to exploration of these planets. Jool's winds might even reverse direction based upon the cloud bands!
Weather is on the [thread=36863]list of things not to suggest[/thread], so I'm closing this.
